version_description: This new version contains various fixes and improvements.

- You can now login easily and securely with Face/Touch ID
- Mobile app support is now available for Wire transfers
- We’ve made other bug fixes and improvements

Welcome to BlockFi's rebuilt mobile app! BlockFi's mobile app now features a reworked user interface and an overall improved experience.

1) Experience BlockFi in dark mode by changing your system theme
2) Check out your balance distribution as a tree map in your interest account; you can change it to a bar graph by long pressing the graph
3) Enable flex interest payments to BTC, ETH, LTC or other cryptocurrencies through your interest preference settings

To always have the latest version, make sure you have automatic app updates turned on. You can find that option in the Settings app under “App Store”.

Welcome to BlockFi's rebuilt mobile app! BlockFi's mobile app now features a reworked user interface and an overall improved experience.

1) Experience BlockFi in dark mode by changing your system theme
2) Check out your balance distribution as a tree map in your interest account; you can change it to a bar graph by long pressing the graph
3) Enable flex interest payments to BTC, ETH, LTC or other cryptocurrencies through your interest preference settings

To always have the latest version, make sure you have automatic app updates turned on. You can find that option in the Settings app under “App Store”.

We've made several bug fixes and improvements to keep your BlockFi experience running smoothly:
- Bug fix: fixed a crash that occurred when pressing and holding on a back button within our withdrawal flow
- Crash fix: fixed a crash that occurred for a small number of clients when attempting to withdraw funds
- Improvement: we improved our address input validation for GUSD withdrawals

Hot Fix Tickets:

• [NMA-1857] Fixed Crash Related to Treemap Coordinator
• [NMA-1858] Fixed Dashboard Reloading Crash

We've made some bug fixes and improvements to keep your BlockFi experience running smoothly:

• Bug Fix: Fixed an issue that prevented a small group of our clients from completing their trades
• Improvement: Made a minor enhancement around the experience when performing trades

We've made some bug fixes and improvements to keep your BlockFi experience running smoothly:
- Bug fix: fixed a UX issue that allowed our clients to withdraw small decimal values that our partners do not support

We have added new features, improvements, and bug fixes to to keep your BlockFi experience running smoothly
◇ New feature: We are getting ready for the release of our credit card on the platform, stay tuned!
◇ New feature: We are always adding new crypto assets to the platform, look out for these assets soon!
◇ Improvement: Infinite scrolling introduced to the transaction list
◇ Bug fix: QR code scanner during the withdrawal flow was previously unresponsive
